title: 3 Concerns for Investors as We Head Into the Fourth Quarter
text:
The weather in Miami in starting to turn nice as we get closer to the end of SeptemberBoth the temperature and humidity levels seem to be dropping incrementally on a daily basisAnother birthday has also come and gone - where does the time go?
